text: haey yeung ban phdephdam dl mnoussa lok( aoy thveula)champoh aupoukamdeay robsa ke . ( daoysaar) mdeay robsa ke ban pr poh roubke daoy lombak them leu lombak bamphot . haey kar phdach bambaw roubke knong amlong pel pir chhnam . dau che neah chaur anak doengkoun champoh yeung ning aupoukamdeay robsa anak choh . champoh yeung kuchea kanleng vilotralb
